sentence: Then, last month, Ron DeSantis, the Republican governor in Florida, took action that threatened to derail that movement: Angry that Bob Chapek, the chief executive of the Walt Disney Company, had spoken out against a Florida law called the Parental Rights in Education act or, by its critics, the Dont Say Gay? law, the governor retaliated.
title: Companies Are Stuck Between Their Workers and Politicians

sentence: Then, last month, Ron DeSantis, the Republican governor in Florida, took action that threatened to derail that movement: Angry that Bob Chapek, the chief executive of the Walt Disney Company, had spoken out against a Florida law called the Parental Rights in Education act or, by its critics, the Dont Say Gay? law, the governor retaliated.
